body_html: It splits images in blocks(rectangles). Lstm cell get states(each has his own gate) from both neighbors at once. ndlstm just run bidirectional rnn on lines and columns (column lstm get the states from lines states as input).
body_text: It splits images in blocks(rectangles). Lstm cell get states(each has his own gate) from both neighbors at once.  ndlstm just run bidirectional rnn on lines and columns (column lstm get the states from lines states as input).
body: It splits images in blocks(rectangles). Lstm cell get states(each has his own gate) from both neighbors at once.  ndlstm just run bidirectional rnn on lines and columns (column lstm get the states from lines states as input).
